Line3.7FA05: I’m old friends with the stable master in town. Tell him I sent you, and he’ll offer you a steed.
VoiceDir1.7FA05: Answering his own question. He knows how Lorath can be stingy and unhelpful at times.
Line1.7FA05: Hold on. Did Lorath offer you his horse for the journey? No. Wait. What am I thinking? Of course not.
